content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:15 p.M. in the evening on 21 december 2007,my wife and i were traveling east between jonesboro and gatesville, coryell county, texas, through sparsely settled open ranch country, on hwy 36 in our dodge ram 3500 truck to meet some friends for dinner when my wife, who was looking out the right hand window saw an extremely bright object coming from the west which she initially thought might be a falling star, as it was streaking somewhat like ones she had seen.  when she realized it was larger than any shooting star she had ever seen, getting brighter, and much lower in the sky she called out for me to slow down and take a look at this thing, which i did.  i first saw it as it passed by her passenger window on our south side and then got a good look at it through our front window.  what i saw was an extremely large, bright white lighted object streaking through the sky at a rapid rate of speed faster than any plane i have ever seen, and i fly a lot, making no sound or sonic wave. not only was it very, very bright, but it's extreme speed seemed to make light bend around it and stream from it so as to make it's actual shape hard to make out. i saw what i thought were small specks of blueish light, which were fast and blurred also embedded in and streaking along the side of this thing as it passed in front of us.  when we first saw it this object was coming across the sky at a slight angle but then it appeared to level off a bit and disappeared suddenly as it neared some hills east of gatesville, just like a shooting star does when it flares out.  when we arrived at our destination dinner party we were quite excited at what we had seen, never having seen anything like it before, and told some folks about it, none of whom appeared much interested.  about that time a couple who had arrived a couple of minutes ahead of us spoke up and said they, too, had seen this thing from another angle at the same time as they were coming into gatesville on a parallel route, hwy 84, from out towards evant, texas. again, however, no one seemed too much interested and the group moved on to dinner.  although we will probably never know exactly what we saw, we saw what we saw, it was what it was, and we enjoyed the show, however short, while it lasted.
content.summary: Very large, very fast, low flying, extremely bright glowing meteor like object descending from the west leveling off and disappearing in the east  past gatesville

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my girlfriends truck in her parents house driveway  date maybe around may 2007- it was dark so 8 or 9pm , and was looking up at the stars, when i noticed a spot with no stars, which was odd. then i realized i was looking at an object very large, and dark, very camoflauged, kinda glistened, once your eye caught it you could totally see it. it was somewhat like a triangle boomarang shape with long wings kinda of with a large head compartment. oddly it reminded me of a stingray or a dragon,i know weird. after a few minutes i paniced an begged my girlfriend to look up, and she started to freak out as well. then her boyfriend pulled up and we tried to point it out to him, but by then it was moving away very fast. it looked like nothing i have ever seen, fast, moved in any directions nothing like a plane. literally the wings did flapping motions but very graceful like a stingray in water, it was like a rolling flap motion. it was so silent, and moved so fast, then it was gone. one thing i noticed it had no bright lights, it was so cameoflauged, and silent. as soon as we started to panic and point at it, that is when it finally moved and left. it was hard to tell how high above it was, maybe 200ft-400ft or so..  far above the house, but not as high as an airplane would fly.
content.summary: Litterally like a sting ray in the sky, dark, moved silently quickly,

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, who is now deceased, and i were driving out of laytonville, california, headed north to leggett, where there is a drive through redwood tree.  it was the saturday after thanksgiving 1999, around 3 in the afternoon.  it was a beautiful, sunny afternoon.  about 6 miles north of laytonville, a silver disc flew over the highway ahead of us.  it was very low over the highway, no more than 50 feet altitude.  it was no more than 200 - 300 feet ahead of us.  at that point on the highway, there is a hill going up to the right and down to the left.  this silver disc came down from the hill on the right, crossed over the highway, and then went down on the left.  as it went down on the left, it seemed to take a dive.  it was going very fast.  if it had been an airplane and there had been an airport there, this plane would have crashed.  i was stunned.  it took quite a few seconds and i said to my wife "what the fuck was that???!!!!!"
she said "you saw that too?  i didn't want to say anything because i thought you'd say i was crazy".  i said "oh, no, you're not crazy, we just saw a ufo!"  

my wife's sister lived in laytonville.  when we got back to their house i asked them if there is an airport anywhere west of highway 101 on that stretch of road.  they said no.  we told them what we saw.  they said that we were crazy.  

the next day we left laytonville to go home to san francisco.  the following year we went back to laytonville for thanksgiving again.  about 5 miles before we got to town, i said to my wife "we saw a ufo up here a year ago".  what was strange about that was that for that year neither had once thought about it.  it was as if it had been erased from our memories.  it wasn't just like forgetting something.  it was strange, like something had affected our brains.  anyway, that weekend we spoke to people about what we saw the year before.  people told us that people who live there see them all the time.  one lady told us that they go up this hill and park and watch them fly over.  since then, they put up a billboard north of laytonville that says "welcome to area 101" and a big flying saucer on it.

they are up there.

there is a question here that asks "what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?"  we both thought it was a ufo right away.
content.summary: Flew over us hwy 101 from east to west

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these strobbing lights three differant times now. the first time was approx. one month ago.Iwas coming from eastland headed to cisco on i twenty. it was about 11:30 pm. and from out of nowhere i noticed a bright light to my left wich is south. as i looked one light was shinning  then suddenly another and so on and so on until the fourth or fifth liht came on and at that time the first would go out and it just kept strobbing in that manner without gaining or loseing elevation or with no lateral movement. this only lasted for about 20 seconds then in an instant it was gone. as i drove to cisco i kept watching the skies to try to explain to myself what i had just seen.I stopped in cisco for some deisel and then headed south on hwy. 183 towards rising star.I was about five miles out of cisco when the same set of lights appeared in front of me at a distance of what appeared to be about two miles.They were approximately 1000 feet or so high.Again this only lasted a very short time but i spent the next twenty five miles to may tx.Starring at the sky and seeing nothing but darkness.Then last week i was again coming from cisco on highway 183 and it was a very clear night at about eight o clock and out of nowhere these huge bright lights appeard in the same manner as before.The lights were big and round and as they would each light up they started out dim and instantly got brighter almost like those huge spotlihts used by car dealers and stores in the big cities when they are having a grand openning or sale.I was a us. marine infantry rifleman trained in nuclear security and later worked security in d.C.And maryland at a very secured military camp.The marine corps trained me for attention to detail and to always observe your surroundings.That was a must and it is something to this day that i still  practice.As the saying goes once a marine always a marine.
content.summary: Big  bright strobing  lights

content.detailedDescription:
i am 66 years old. this story happened when i was about 16 years old. after watching the ufo program on larry king live, it made me think of this incident.  after watching the program on tv and visiting stanton friedman's web site, i feel inclined to tell my story.  i have kept it to myself all these years, because when i tried to share it, most people thought i was crazy.  also, i had some fear of becoming a target for someone or something, i didn't know what.  since i am 66, i feel that i don't really have that much to loose. so i have decided to share it with the world.
  
i was coming home with a friend to study for a test one night.  we had been at her house studying after school, and we were coming to my house for supper and then study afterward at my house. as we were walking up the steps to my porch, i heard something that sounded like bird wings fluttering, but much louder.  as i swatted my ears i turned to see a circular object hovering over me.  it appeared to be rotating slowly and had flashing red, white, and blue lights all the way around its perimeter.  i first thought that it was small and within arms reach.  then after about five seconds it began to move and i could see that it was much bigger and at a greater distance from me.  it moved slowly at first then zoomed off straight away from me and was completely out of sight in about two seconds. it made very little sound in its flight.

my friend and i ran inside and began to share our story with my parents and my sisters.  we immediately realized that we had lost about two hours.  we completely missed supper and the clean up following supper.  my family did not believe us.  they thought we were making up the story to excuse ourselves for being late.  

i also discovered that if i tried to tell the story to anyone, they would think i was crazy.  my plans were to attend university of florida and live at home.  someone recommended me to the u s naval school of music in washington dc.  and i ended up living in washington, dc for about six years.  i began to feel paranoid about that and developed a fear that some power greater that i, had planned my life to include washington, dc.

i've have never really thought that much about for many years, but this story and the experience remains vivid in my mind.  i hope someone can benefit from my decision to make it public.

paul young
content.summary: I saw a circle shaped flying object that appeared to be rotating slowly

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from the grocery store  i looked up at the sky and saw 3 comet looking things, i commented to my son they looked like comets, but they were going in a horizontal line at 3 different altitudes, not falling and by the time we got home they were gone. he said maybe falling stars, but it wasn't the same. i joked and said maybe they were ufo's, but after seeing the report on larry king maybe it wasn't a joke. i thought maybe airplanes, but i am a flight attendant and have never seen any aircraft look like this or with the bright lighting at the one end like this, nor fly at that altitude with those characteristics?
content.summary: 3 comet looking things going horizontal

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i remember to this day when we saw something inexplicable in the sky on a summer evening in '75 or '76.  we saw a glowing-orange perfectly-shaped orb, which was larger than a full moon, arc near the horizon rise above the tree tops and homes and travel across the evening sky from the south east to the west, not slowly, not quickly, but at a steady rate for about 20 seconds.  i was in awe and was full of wonderment rather than fear, i tried to rationalize what it was. i ran inside the house to get my parents. as i did, my friend said there was a second one in the sky.  by the time my parents came out, the orbs were gone.  i could discern that this was not a weather balloon, plane, blimp, weather phenomena, etc. we did not call the police to report it as we were afraid we wouldn't be taken seriously.  we thought we would see something in the news, as i lived near town and thought others had to have seen this, but no mention was ever made.
content.summary: Silent, glowing orange orb, steady pace across night sky for about 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Mackinac55 county, mi. june 1988. weather conditions: clear, calm, twilight(dusk).Resided, hunted and fished in the exact area for 20 years(know the spot well (cut firewood and picked berries at the exact spot(i spent 9 years in the usaf as a aircraft mechanic worked many night outside sunset to sunrise and never guestioned any thing i saw.< this was a close encounter>. we were riding on a two track in the deep woods looking for wildlife and talking like usual. the woods in this area are old growth forest.The 2 track we were on is like a tunnel of trees for about half mile in length. from the air im sure you cannot see the road. i was driving slow around 3 to 5 mph.(looking for wildlife and enjoying time with my sister). we were most of the way through the tunnel of trees. i knew exackly where i was. there is a slite gradual up grade for a little bit and then you see the exit from the tunnel of trees.Up to that point the exit is not visible.( i think we surprised our ufo). anyway as we crested the slight grade i was looking towards and talking to my sister.She said there is a truck coming( with one headlight not bright but soft white light-at this instance things faded fast, quickly. the first thing i remember- we were hunched over facing each other blinking at each other like we were just waking-up.We looked out the windshield and going across the glass( within feet-not yards), red lights (not bright) moved from front to back. the red lights were 1-2 feet long 5-6 inches wide covering the windshield, not rotating just going front to back.The wierd thing was is the craft looked translusant.Within seconds my sister starts freekingout( losing it- yelling "oh my #&&% what was that, lets get out of here before it come after us". my reaction was different. first i told my sister to calm down. then i told her i was getting out of the truck to look.She thought i was nuts.Once in a life time chance i thought to maybe see something out of this world.I got out of the truck guick enough i thought, looked all around, up down, in and out,saw nothing, no leaves moving just feet above us. what was the object?One other thing,there is a highline at the exit of the tree tunnel.
content.summary: Guarter mile soft white light, two track, put us to sleep, slumped over, waking up within feet red lights crossed windshield slowly.

content.detailedDescription: the event took place roughly 20 years ago, i was a child at the time maybe ten years of age. now what am saying here makes no sense and seems completeley impossible but i believe it to be true. i lived in a small city in ontario canada with approx. 20000 people.  my older sister which was with me during the sighting. it was the middle of the afternoon, sunny and warm.  the two of us were standing in our neighbours backyard staring up at a huge ufo, had to be the size of 3 or 4 city blocks, it was a saucer shape and hovered above a large pine tree very low to the ground and made no sound at all.  now this was the middle of the day remember with 20000 people that should have seen this enormous craft. i remember staring at it not scared, excited or anything, it was just there. we stood there staring as it hovered over our heads, next thing i knew it was getting dark we were walking home.  my sister and i didn't discuss it, we were very calm, as if nothing happened at all.  we talk about it from time to time now and how we should have had some type of emotion, we should have been scared, excited or something but it didn't matter it was as if it was normal. "20000 people" "middle of the day""enormous craft" but not one report the next day, nobody saw a thing just my sister and i. the weird thing was the time we missed it had to be a few hours just gone.  i am only putting this up here for research how can two people see this enormous thing and not one other person see it, it was so low to the ground.  use this info the way you want, i am a simple person, quiet and don't wish to be contacted, i would like to be left alone! but nobody has an account like this one and thought maybe it could open the researchers eyes.
content.summary: Very large about 3 or 4 city blocks

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home which was about a 20 mile trip backroad from the small town i went to school in, and had just left. it was pretty close to 11:00 p.M.  this is primarily pasture and grazing land area, just a few scattered ranch houses at the time this happened.  i was headed on a straight stretch of road and it had a long shallow dip in the road ahead.  i traveled this way all the time, day and night.  when off to the right of the road up in the sky i saw an object that had lights on the side of it. round lights from the look of brightness.  the lights were on the side of the aircraft. (if i had to estimate how far away off the road ahead to the right of me it was, maybe a football field?  at first i thought it was a helicopter from the airforce base north of us.  but then as it got closer and also since i was moving forward down the road, we were coming to a point of were it was going to be directly over my right side at the rate of speed i was going.  i am kinda hunkered down looking out my right windshield and the right passenger window when all of a sudden the lights that had been directly on the side of the aircraft,(sorry i forgot to give total discription) object was disc shape and estimated (this is the hard part to really describe maybe around 150 ft. wide, ) anyway the lights that had been directly on the side pointing towards the road, and it by the way is still over pasture land, heading towards the road,slowly. the lights just like all of a sudden point to the ground, either they were directed from the sides of the object or other ones were turned on and the side ones off, i have no idea.  but at split second the ground became daylight.  and i mean daylight. i could see the mesquite trees just like the sun was on them.  that is when i became unbelievably scared. even while i am writing this i can still feel the tightening in my chest. and this is the first time i have ever written this down.  at that moment when the lights came down, i reached over and just rolled down the window just a few inches to listen, my mind i can only remember it was racing do i hear something?  i wanted to hear the helicopter noise, and i didn't hear a thing, just the wind noise of the car going down the road. i am heading for the shallow long dip in the road and all i can think is stupidly by the time i reach that dip it will be over my car and it will see me, how stupid is that...It could see my anyway because of my lights...I just kept thinking the lights will hit right on top of my car , do i stop or do i go faster to get past that part of the road so it lights won't be right on top of me.  at the time this was all i could think, it sounds so stupid, but that was what i could only think.  so i floored it.  i buried the speedometer.  the next think i remember is looking back in my review and seeing the objects lights hit the road were i had been and making it just like daylight.  i did not slow down and kept watching in my review and side view until it was off the road into the other side of pasture some several yards then the lights went off.  i was approx. less than 5 miles from my home. i remember beating on the front door, my mother answered. i was extremely upset, my mother can attest to the way i was.  i am still very unclear about the after i got home part, but the occurence of this has been with me for years, i have told very few about it.  my mother called the airforce base the next day and asked about any manuevers that were going on,etc. etc. they said there were none.  anyway i know what i saw and what happened so close to me was nothing that i have seen again except on other pictures of sightings from other people on t.V. or paper.  there is also something that has disturbed me and also my mom.  i don't like to think about this part at all.  it was a little before 11:00 when this happened, and i was about 7 miles out from home.  my mother swears it was after 12:00 midnight when i was beating on the door.  that really bothers me. there are things about me medically i have wondered about, no not weird scars or things like that, but women problems, ammunity, other things that makes me question every once in awhile, i think about but i do not dwell on.  i just know i saw the object, and i really hope that is all that happened.  thank you for your time, and if you wondered why i decided after all these years to put this out now, i have been following the texas sightings on t.V. and it prompted me to tell my story.  feels good to do so, but sitting here typing this i swear my heart is racing, it still makes me very uncomfortable, the fear that was involved with it.
thank you again.   d/ in texas
content.summary: Lights hitting the ground making it look like daylight, all i could think..It's going to be right on top of me...

content.detailedDescription:
While attending wichita high school southeast,(1960) i, donald molzen, and mike greshiam belonged to nasa (as a volunteers). we tracked satellite launches from cape canaveral. on an evening in the winter of 1960 a lady named, barbra battie,(part of our team)sighted an object, which was also verified in australia that same night. this object was seen for several nights around the world. it was called batties moon by nasa. i doubt if you will find any documentation on this. we documented the sighting and nasa confirmed it. this object from the magnitude of brilliance and orbit was believed to be 3 miles in diameter. that���s a big object to come and go? 

my wife, joy, and i saw strange lights in the socorro nm. area a few years ago, knowing that it was not a normal occurrence. joy and a friend (a high school football coach) observed an u.F.O traveling from north to south over the n.E. heights in albuquerque, n. m. around 1 a.M. in the late 1990s. joy, being formerly a fighter pilot���s wife and an a.F. brat of a pilot, had grown up around planes etc. she and her friend both saw what they saw, but had no desire to report their sighting. joy states there was no way for her to judge the altitude or size of the object,(it was not at a low altitude) that it appeared to be three large, bright lights lined up across as though in formation, or it could have been one large object with three lights. she pointed the traveling lights out and she and her companion had absolutely no desire to discuss or report what they had seen (due to being rather freaked out and what would they say and to whom?) her attitude is that she saw what she saw, accepts that it was not anything that could be explained, but neither she nor her friend felt a need to try and report it.

after watching larry king this evening, we thought maybe you would appreciate our stories. 

sincerely, 
rick molzen
content.summary: As seen in a desktop wide angle telescope

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and brother-in-law's next neighbor called them one morning to come over to see what he had found in his backyard when he arose that morning. it was a very large circular depression in the grass, covered with a gray, ash-like material which they each touched with their fingers and hands. this neighbor, being a local small-town school principal, would not report this finding because he was afraid that he would be fired from his job. i can't remember, but it may have been 20 or 30 years ago.

my brother-in-law will have difficulty speaking with you because he has parkinson's disease, but the more comfortable he becomes, the more you will be able to understand him. my sister may or may not remember as much as her husband.

i have always felt this incident was very important to report -- to whom, i didn't know.
content.summary: A.M.: deep circle in next-door neighbors backyard grass covered with ash-like material

content.detailedDescription: At almost exactly 9:26 p.M. my wife and i just finished watching a tv show and went outside to smoke a cigarette, at the same time i also took my dogs out. i noticed a bright light in the sky. it was wierd because it was cloudy and  also fog was starting to roll in.  i went over to my neighbors yard to see it clearer. ( no trees). at first the light did not move. it changed in brightness from what mars would look like on a clear evening to what would be an aircraft with its lights on coming directly at us. it was very bright. i went in to the house to get my binoculars. i asked my wife to get the camera. it has video capability. when i came back out it started to move just north of us heading west. i went back over to my neighbors yard to view this thing with them. all i could see was a bright light. no visible structure. as it came to be just north of us, my wife noticed that it was pulsing red  not like a strobe light. but a slow red pulse. each pulse would last about a second and a half. it wasn'nt exactly red either it had an orangish glow to it. my wife tried to get a video of it but as of right now, we have not looked at it.  we did not see any green with it as an aircraft would. regular aircraft have strobes of red and green. there was no green. there was no sound at all. the light seemed to be about maybe three to four miles away. it was low in the sky because i could see the clouds above it. if you check the cloud ceiling for this night at that time, it couldn't have been more than 7000 ft. also the fog was just starting to roll in but hadn't arrived at my house. the object headed west slowly until we lost sight of it going behind the trees in our back yard. my wife and i discussed what we saw. i was dumbfounded at what i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: variable white bright light coming toward us then red & orange pulsing light as it passed us

content.detailedDescription:
we; my two oldest boys and i , had been to brownwood and were on our way home to comanche. we were somewhere between blanket and comanche when it appeared in the sky. we pulled over to the side of the highway, along with a dozen or so other cars. i don't remember anyone getting out of their cars....The object looked huge, pulsing like a heart, and very bright, lighting up the sky. 
 we all just sat and watched, for probably thirty minutes or so;finally the object seemed to rock backwards and then forward a time or two and then just zipped off to our left. one minute it was there, the next second it was out of sight, like a comet or shooting star, it moved faster than i thought anything could and with no effort or sound that i could hear. we all started our cars and continued on our way. i still wonder to this day, why none of us in the cars didn't get out and ask each other what had just happened.
 we were scared, not knowing what to expect, but i felt sure that it was a space craft. my boys and i still talk about the experience...Was there a time lapse,were we contacted by the ship....Who knows, we have no memory of anything like that.
content.summary: Awe inspiring, to see the large pulsing bright object hoovering in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting i saw was witnessed by a vast number of people on a psa airline flight in 1980. the stewardess was totally freaked out. i was with two friends bill barth and randy kuolt. randy kuolt's father founded horizon airlines and thousand trails campgrounds. when we deplaned, the pilot stepped up to me and said "if you report what you saw, i will see that you ride amtrack the rest of your life." i reported that pilot to psa airlines, in san diego,california, by the way that airline went out of business. the pilot had no idea he was addressing a pr man, the last person in the world, you should ever try to shut up. 

in 1978, i did a ufo survey to promote a disc like toy. the late j. allen hynek, listened to my recordings and wanted to know, if i believed in ufo's? at that time, the event in the air, aboard the psa flight had not happened. i told j. allen hynek at the time, i did not know. today i am not ashamed to proudly state "i saw a ufo, outside the window of an airplane, traveling from las vegas to los angeles. i watched for several minutes as the object with green and red light stayed right outside that window. for years i kept the sighting quiet, the airplane pilot was very intimidating, however i know what i saw, and none who can ever change my mind, not even that idiot,james mcgaha, who appears to be a man, like many of the people, in the public eye, who say and do things without any reason or truth, they just want attention. mr. mcgaha is a disgrace to the intelligent and truthful people in this country who have witnessed sightings. he makes things up as he goes along, larry king should have better sense to have him on his show,but having placed people of the larry king show, he is after rating not truth or fact. one way to eliminate magaha is to ignore him, when that happens the luster for that idiot, will disappear.

our government knows what's up, they just can't deal with life out there, when they can't solve the problems in our own country. can you imagine, ailen life lands in south central los angeles, during a gang war, cops have sealed off neighborhood. a space craft lands, ailens step out and ask the gang members, and the police, why are they are fighting each other.That is why the united states government does not want to address flying objects and a higher life form. 

chris harris
harris-delorean special events international
content.summary: The object came alongside window of airplane remained there for 30 minutes. passengers, stewardess and pilot saw the object.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was comming home after we had dinner at a resturant. as we pulled into our driveway, we saw a very large aircraft fly over our house as we was sitting in our car. this aircraft had a sharp point on the front of the craft, the wings curved aroud towards the back of the the craft. the lights were very bright on the bottom of the craft.
content.summary: Flying aircraft with a speer like nose, wings curved back towards back of aircraft.. lots of lights under the aircraft. made no noise as it flew over.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was comming home after we had dinner at a resturant. as we pulled into our driveway, we saw a very large aircraft fly over our house as we was sitting in our car. this aircraft had a sharp point on the front of the craft, the wings curved aroud towards the back of the the craft. the lights were very bright on the bottom of the craft.
content.summary: Flying aircraft with a speer like nose, wings curved back towards back of aircraft.. lots of lights under the aircraft. made no noise as it flew over.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along to meet a friend at a movie.  it was dark and it was suburbs.  stars in the sky and a clear night.  i noticed what i thought might be a plane moving along the same direction and seemingly same speed as i am.  it was way up in the sky.  i came to a stop light and looked up.  the plane stopped when i stopped.  i gasped in disbelief and the object i thought was a plane bolted straight up into the sky from where i was and disappeared.  i thought lots of things, but never tried to get confirmation ... i tried to talk myself out of thinking i saw what i thought i saw.  i'm still a little unsure, but it just doesn't seem normal the way it all happened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Odd moving star

content.detailedDescription: After the craft went behind the car i looked back in front of the car becouse we were still driving towards the intersection i looked to see were the other two went thats when i seen airplane or jet they had regular strobes. the craft then flew next to the car, right next to me i was the passenger in the car, ther was no doubt about it was a flying thing it made no noise it darted away from me and back so fast it looked like it would get smaller as it went away and when it came back within range i swear i could of reached out the window and touched it.By this time we were approaching the traffic light it then flew in front of the car and was close to traffic light it started changing colors but not like it had lights on it but like the air around it was changing colors. we had the red light and ther was another car at the cross street their light was green but they did not move they had to be seeing what i was seeing, when i ask my wife are you seeing this she acted as though she was in a trance and said with out looking that it was a jet.Her son was sitting on my lap as it flew next to the car he was five at the time and he was stairing at it the whole time, so i know i seen what i seen,and that was weird to becouse we have always strapped our kids into the car seat.After the light changed we turned left the craft then went from right above us to a small white light it stayed visible only getting smaller the closer we got to home, we lived next to the defense electronics supply command. that was it for that night on the following day i took my wife back to work we took the same way on turning on to the road i noticed some men by the area were the craft was zooming away from the car and back again they were as intereated in me as much as i was of them, they were in unmarked trucks they did not have kettering or beavercreek logos. when inoticed them like i said they looked real hard at me creepy. that night i was kind of scared to go pick ruth up from work for one i was alone little ronnie was at his dads for the weekend anyway as i turned the corner to go past that field up in sky was one single amber colored light like the night before as soon as i seen it i thout to my self oh man i dont need this and it disappeared.Alot of other things happened after that for years some things im scared to mention on the internet plus as you can see im not much of a typist. i have had two sons of my own since then and here lately they have been seeing lights flying funny zig zag paterns around in the mornings on thier way to bus stop. i know what i saw and so does the goverment like i said weird things like helicoptors flying up from behind buildings follwing me my boy when he was two drew stange alien faces and craft i was scared for my kids as im starting to again. ihave seen cigar shaped craft in 1998 with a coworker and again it responded when i thought to my self if you can hear me stop and go in reverse and it did and the coworker seenit do this we both got scared and left in a hurry he was so scared he didnt want to talk about it.After the sightings in texas and what my boys have seen lately i am scared to.
content.summary: Lights in a triangle formation when i noticed they were not lights a pop sound was heard and it dropped down and went behind the car and positioned itself so that i could still see it

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house after sunset with my dog. i always look at the stars while waiting. i saw something flying in the sky very low. at first i thought it was a helicopter but then i decided it was too big for a helicopter. what made me decide it wasn't a helicopter first was it was flying very slow. at that point, i thought ufo. it was irratic, it was just flying slow and straight. it was very quiet, almost a hum sound and i only heard that after it had passed my house. so, i knew it wasn't an airplane. as i watched the object, it has several lights which were very bright. there were red lights that were blinking and one side it had very bright lights which reminded me of head lights and as it passed it had the same bright lights which would make me think of the back. i don't remember any green lights like airplanes have that also made me think it wasn't an airplane. the object flew very close to the ground. i waited and watched wondering if the craft was going to crash because it was so low to the ground. looking at the lights, the object looked very big and maybe round could be round and long but i do know it was very big, much too big for an airplane. as i stood there, i remember thinking if it was an ufo, they could have taken me at anytime. i remember just standing there glued to the sight feeling like i had my mouth just gapped open. i lost sight of the object as it flew past my house to the point i couldn't see it anymore. i just stood there wondering what i just saw. i didn't say anything at first because i didn't know what i had just seen in the sky. my best friend called me from arizona and asked if i had heard about the ufo sightings in stephenville, texas where i had attended tarleton a few years ago and is located about an hour away. i said no, so i looked up the article from their local paper and the descriptions given sounded just like the same object i saw, that's when i really began to think about what i saw. my friend called and told me about the trucker who saw something over cisco and said i needed to report my sighting. i believe without a doubt what i saw is an ufo. not an airplane, not a helicopter, not a commercial plane. if a commercial plane was flying this low, they need to rethink their flying. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Ufo seen in cisco. flying object looked very different than any seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling home from work. going west on interstate 20, a short distance from the hwy 281 intersection.  through my windshield i saw a bright light moving across the sky on my left.  the light moved from east to west and was south of the interstate, appearing to be approximately over the stephenville area.  my first thought was that it might be a meteor shower.  i immediately dismissed that idea, as it was too large and bright, was moving too slowly, and it was the only one.  i then thought it was an airplane, and for a moment i was afraid that it might be a plane going down, but again it just didn't fit and there wasn't a crash.  it was too low to the ground and moving too slow.  it was green, not white or red like airline lights.  it appeared as a single light, not multiple lights as on a plane, and it wasn't blinking. if it was an airplane the lights would have been much smaller.  it did not ascend and only descended slightly and then just disappeared.  it did not fade away.  i immediately looked at the clock and it was 7:52 p.M.  it had only lasted a matter of minutes.  i knew it was something very strange and extraordinary and wanted to know the time so that i could investigate the next day.  the next morning, for the first time, i heard about the other sitings in the area and knew that was what i had seen.  i was, and still am, excited.  it was a very unique experience, and i am glad that i saw it, whatever it was.
content.summary: Green light moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: After the craft went behind the car i looked back in front of the car becouse we were still driving towards the intersection i looked to see were the other two went thats when i seen airplane or jet they had regular strobes. the craft then flew next to the car, right next to me i was the passenger in the car, ther was no doubt about it was a flying thing it made no noise it darted away from me and back so fast it looked like it would get smaller as it went away and when it came back within range i swear i could of reached out the window and touched it.By this time we were approaching the traffic light it then flew in front of the car and was close to traffic light it started changing colors but not like it had lights on it but like the air around it was changing colors. we had the red light and ther was another car at the cross street their light was green but they did not move they had to be seeing what i was seeing, when i ask my wife are you seeing this she acted as though she was in a trance and said with out looking that it was a jet.Her son was sitting on my lap as it flew next to the car he was five at the time and he was stairing at it the whole time, so i know i seen what i seen,and that was weird to becouse we have always strapped our kids into the car seat.After the light changed we turned left the craft then went from right above us to a small white light it stayed visible only getting smaller the closer we got to home, we lived next to the defense electronics supply command. that was it for that night on the following day i took my wife back to work we took the same way on turning on to the road i noticed some men by the area were the craft was zooming away from the car and back again they were as intereated in me as much as i was of them, they were in unmarked trucks they did not have kettering or beavercreek logos. when inoticed them like i said they looked real hard at me creepy. that night i was kind of scared to go pick ruth up from work for one i was alone little ronnie was at his dads for the weekend anyway as i turned the corner to go past that field up in sky was one single amber colored light like the night before as soon as i seen it i thout to my self oh man i dont need this and it disappeared.Alot of other things happened after that for years some things im scared to mention on the internet plus as you can see im not much of a typist. i have had two sons of my own since then and here lately they have been seeing lights flying funny zig zag paterns around in the mornings on thier way to bus stop. i know what i saw and so does the goverment like i said weird things like helicoptors flying up from behind buildings follwing me my boy when he was two drew stange alien faces and craft i was scared for my kids as im starting to again. ihave seen cigar shaped craft in 1998 with a coworker and again it responded when i thought to my self if you can hear me stop and go in reverse and it did and the coworker seenit do this we both got scared and left in a hurry he was so scared he didnt want to talk about it.After the sightings in texas and what my boys have seen lately i am scared to.
content.summary: Lights in a triangle formation when i noticed they were not lights a pop sound was heard and it dropped down and went behind the car and positioned itself so that i could still see it

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on the way to the gym at about 5:20 am., 16 jan 2008.  it was still very dark out.  we drive in seperate cars since i head directly to work after working out.  the gym is about 2.5 miles down the street from my home.  my husband left about a minute before me.  as i was driving and crossing over the highway a flash of light caught me eye above the trees, to my left.  i looked up and saw lots of flashes, all over the sky.  i was driving and was going to stop and watch, but then decided i wanted my husband to see this too.  i quickly drove to the gym, parked and got out of the car as quickly as i could.  my husband met me in the parking lot and i told him to "look at the sky."  he just stopped and said, "wow."  there were hundreds of flashing white/yellowish round lights.  it looked like a swarm. it didn't look like a meteor shower at all.  the lights were all strobing on and off.  they were in the eastern part of the sky. there was no sound coming from them. it was so bright and so amazing. we watched for about 5 minutes until they faded away. i don't know how we could be the only ones that saw it. i have never seen anything like it before.  i don't know what we were looking at.  it definitely was not helicopters or a military craft.
content.summary: Hundreds of ufos?

content.detailedDescription:
I drive a water transport in the oilfield out of bono,tx. i drive to and from stephenville saturday thru wednesday. i left work at 5:45pm tuesday evening january 8, 2008, traveling west on hwy.67, between chalk mountain and three way. this is when something caught my eye off in the western sky. i saw two very bright lights shining in no apparent direction. the lights were very bright, like a welding arc. the lights were dancing around and then they split in two diffrent directions at a very fast rate of speed.

i do not know what it was that i saw, but i don't think that it was a plane, weather balloon, a reflection of the sun or anything manmade.


                                           thank you, harlan cowan
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two really bright lights fairly close together dancing round then they split in opposite directions

content.detailedDescription: I was at the bus stop in  the morning.  nobody was around and nobody was awake.  i looked over at the trees and there was a red light.  i thought it was a plane until it emerged.  it floated straight upwards and all of a sudden i couldn't move.  i got really shakey and i just stared at it in awe.  it moved really weird.  really fast left to right and up and down.  and it was rotating at the same time.  i watched it as it passed and then it just disapeared, maybe it just started going really really fast so i couldn't see.  but i know it was not a plane.  i felt like i was going to throw up after it happened for a long time.  it was very close to my house so now i am worried.  but i hope to see it again.
content.summary: Scary, fast, shocking

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on i-26 from columbia, sc to charleston, about 35 miles west of the intersection of i-26 and i-95 i notices lights in the sky.  it was just becoming dusk.  i thought it was a plane.  but the ligthts went around in a circle, and changed colors.  blue, orange, white yellow.  they kept on in the exact same position, not going higher or lower, not moving left or right, or towards me or away.  by the time i got to the intersection of i-26 and i-85 and crossed just under i-85 (it ws dark enough now to require headlights) on the left side of the highway, over a field i still look at to this day with nothing but grass and a few pine trees, about 65 feet in the air, a metal disc was floating with the lights now stopped.  i was in the eastbound land, so including the width of that lane, the median, and the west bound lanes and the distance from the edge of that to a spot directly below the object was 200 to 300 feet.  i slowed down to 20 miles per hour, opened my window, and there was no sound.  i wanted to stop badly, but my wife was pregnant with our first child, and i was not sure what would happen.

the only reason i am writing is right behind me was an 18 wheeler, he too slowed down to about 20 mph and i presume looking at the object.  traffic at that moment was light, and there were no cars at that spot at that moment heading westbound, nor anyone close behind the truck.  i wanted to stop and talk to the truck driver, but what awe struck and simply kept driving.  i am in hopes he has filled out a report, and it could be a kind of coroboration to match our reports up.
content.summary: Round disc with lights floating about 65 feet in the air seen from about 70 feet away metal object making no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:05 pm tuesday night nov 27th, i went out on my front porch facing east and admired the cold clear night sky.

i'm looking up at a 40 degree angle and from behind a clump of trees to my right these three orbs in a line abrest east/west orientation moved rapidly from southeast to northwest and dissappeared behind the another stand of trees to my left. 

these objects appeared to be low as they were much larger than stars and closer to the size of a normal street lamp in size on a 30 foot pole. but not as bright. they were dim pinkish/orange elipitical orbs in shape.

i immediately had goose bumps and went further into yard to try and see where they were but they had disappeared.

i went inside and called my brother in fort worth texas.

we had seen a saucer some 40 years earlier in daylight with binoculars hovering in the early morning light above carswell afb in fort worth. so we have seen what a true saucer looks like.
content.summary: 3 spheres/orbs in line abrest, dull pink/orange color ,low altitude moved rapidly south to north
